definitions.definition: (mostly in plural) A computer-generated image as viewed on a screen forming part of a game or a film etc.
definitions.example: I've just played this new computer game: the graphics are amazing.

definitions.definition: Vivid, descriptive, often in relation to depictions of sex or violence.
Having a texture that resembles writing, commonly created by exsolution, devitrification and immiscibility processes in igneous rocks.
